mapper.sql: ID, ITEM_TYPE, DOC_ID, FROM_NAME, TO_NAME, CREATION_DATE, CREATOR, REJECTER, REJECT_DATE, SENDER, SEND_DATE, RECEIVER, RECEIVE_DATE, STAUTS, COMMENT, SYN_STATUS, STATUS, APPLICANT, APPLY_DATE, CONFIRMER, CONFIRM_DATE, STAUTS1, COMMENT1
mapper.select:
select
from exc_transfer order by ID
mapper.insert: insert into exc_transfer ( ID, ITEM_TYPE, DOC_ID, FROM_NAME, TO_NAME, CREATION_DATE, CREATOR, REJECTER, REJECT_DATE, SENDER, SEND_DATE, RECEIVER, RECEIVE_DATE, STAUTS, COMMENT, SYN_STATUS, STATUS, APPLICANT, APPLY_DATE, CONFIRMER, CONFIRM_DATE, STAUTS1, COMMENT1 ) values ( #{id}, #{itemType}, #{docId}, #{fromName}, #{toName}, #{creationDate}, #{creator}, #{rejecter}, #{rejectDate}, #{sender}, #{sendDate}, #{receiver}, #{receiveDate}, #{stauts}, #{comment}, #{synStatus}, #{status}, #{applicant}, #{applyDate}, #{confirmer}, #{confirmDate}, #{stauts1}, #{comment1} )

mapper.update:
update exc_transfer
ID=#{id,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
ITEM_TYPE=#{itemType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DOC_ID=#{docId,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
FROM_NAME=#{fromName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
TO_NAME=#{toName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
CREATION_DATE=#{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR=#{creator,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
REJECTER=#{rejecter,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
REJECT_DATE=#{rejectDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SENDER=#{sender,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
SEND_DATE=#{sendDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RECEIVER=#{receiver,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
RECEIVE_DATE=#{receiveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STAUTS=#{stauts,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
COMMENT=#{comment,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
SYN_STATUS=#{synStatus,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
STATUS=#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APPLICANT=#{applicant,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
APPLY_DATE=#{applyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CONFIRMER=#{confirmer,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
CONFIRM_DATE=#{confirmDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STAUTS1=#{stauts1,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
COMMENT1=#{comment1,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ecm_component set ID=#{id}, ITEM_TYPE=#{itemType}, DOC_ID=#{docId}, FROM_NAME=#{fromName}, TO_NAME=#{toName}, CREATION_DATE=#{creationDate}, CREATOR=#{creator}, REJECTER=#{rejecter}, REJECT_DATE=#{rejectDate}, SENDER=#{sender}, SEND_DATE=#{sendDate}, RECEIVER=#{receiver}, RECEIVE_DATE=#{receiveDate}, STAUTS=#{stauts}, COMMENT=#{comment}, SYN_STATUS=#{synStatus}, STATUS=#{status}, APPLICANT=#{applicant}, APPLY_DATE=#{applyDate}, CONFIRMER=#{confirmer}, CONFIRM_DATE=#{confirmDate}, STAUTS1=#{stauts1}, COMMENT1=#{comment1} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
